alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 9:02AM EST until January 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Moderate flood stage with numerous homes in the Maples area of Shelton affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:46 AM EST Saturday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Sat 8 am: 11.4 Forecast: Sat 1 pm 14.1 Sat 7 pm 13.1 Sun 1 am 12.2 Sun 7 am 11.8 Sun 1 pm 11.5 Sun 7 pm 11.2 Mon 1 am 11.0 Mon 7 am 10.7 Mon 1 pm 10.4 Mon 7 pm 10.2 &&
